title: Tata Motors sales rise 8% in February at 86,406 units
description: In February, Tata Motors reported an 8% increase in total wholesales, reaching 86,406 units compared to 79,705 units in the same period last year. Domestic sales saw a 9% growth, totaling 84,834 units compared to 78,006 units last year. Passenger vehicle sales, including electric vehicles, rose by 19% to 51,321 units from 43,140 units in February last year.
